messages.title: Because Peterborough Deserves Better
messages.content: The people of Peterborough deserve better than what the current government is giving them. Vote Labour for a better future for you, your family, and your community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will fight for dedicated funding to ensure we have cleaner and safer communities.
Labour will stop the damaging NHS experiments in restructuring and ensure the service has the resources it needs.
Labour will put 10,000 police officers on the streets throughout the country, dealing with offenders and securing our communities.
Labour is committed to maintaining the Triple Lock on state pensions.
Labour’s economic policies will create fairer opportunities for everyone, not just for a narrow elite.

issues.education: Labour will undo the damaging education policies imposed by the Tory government.
issues.government: After seven years of Tory-led governments and relentless austerity.
issues.health: Labour is the party that founded the NHS; now, we will save it by stopping the damaging Tory experiments in NHS restructuring.
issues.lawCrime: Labour will put 10,000 police officers on the streets throughout the country, dealing with offenders and securing our communities.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour is committed to maintaining the Triple Lock on state pensions.

community.content: Labour will fight for dedicated funding to ensure we have cleaner and safer communities.

contactInformation.address: 7 Northey House, Oxney Road, Peterborough PE1 5YW

endorsements.endorsement: Fiona is a bright, dynamic, sincere and caring individual. When elected, I know she will be an excellent MP who will make the welfare of the people of Peterborough her top priority.

quotes.text: The people of Peterborough deserve better than what the current government is giving them. Vote Labour for a better future for you, your family, and your community.

examples: NHS waiting lists are rising, education is under threat, basic public services are eroding fast.
